decision_conditions: The development to which this consent relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date on which the consent is granted.  Reason: To comply with the provisions of Section 18(1) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, as amended. | The proposal shall be implemented in accordance with the materials as approved in relation to condition 3 of planning application reference P/2011/4579 unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.   Reason: To ensure that the materials are compatible with the architectural and/or historic interest of the Listed Building and the Bedford Park Conservation Area, in accordance with policy 4.6 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' 2004 and the Bedford Park Conservation Area Management Plan (September 2007), and policy 7.8 of the London Plan (2011). | The proposal shall be implemented in accordance with the landscaping details as approved in relation to condition 4 of planning application reference P/2011/4579 unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local planning Authority.   Reason: To ensure that the development is compatible with the architectural and/or historic interest of the Listed Building and the Bedford Park Conservation Area, in accordance with policy 4.6 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' 2004 and the Bedford Park Conservation Area Management Plan (September 2007), and 7.8 of the London Plan (2011).
description: Construction of a two storey detached residential studio, following demolition of existing building (Listed Building Consent)
